parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~60933~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the node.

> You can set this parameter to query the parameter settings of the specified node in a cluster instance.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
